snippet.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Developed by Toka and published by Swing! Deutschland, this racing game is based on the second live-action movie based on the Hanna-Barbera cartoon. This was originally going to be released for the SEGA Dreamcast by a different developer (Full Fat), but that version was scrapped. Speaking of scrapped, the game was also supposed to get a GameCube version from Kemco and even a Japanese release, as evidenced by being featured on a Dengeki PS2 PlayStation demo disc. The GameCube was ALSO scrapped, so was the Japanese version, which makes Viva Rock Vegas on the PS2 a PAL exclusive.

The Flintstones (C) Warner Bros. Discovery
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas (C) Universal

#retrogames #retrogaming #playstation2 #ps2 #flintstones #theflintstones #hannabarbera #vivarockvegas #flintstonesinvivarockvegas
